property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fall to your knees and welcome our embrace." - Qal-Sha, Priest of Norn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Phyrexians are vulnerable. Do not despair. We will prevail!" - Juryan, rebel leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -/1-1 counter on target creature. Then, if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers." - Tome of Machines, verse 1703

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, put two 1/1 white soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Kemba's Legion can block an additional creature for each Equipment attached to Kemba's Legion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The squabble over succession was quickly replaced by the struggle to survive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The infection has spread farther than we could glimpse from the heights of Taj-Nar."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This war is not about loxodon or leonin, Sylvok or Auriok. To defeat these rotters, we must do it together."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike, protection from black and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and a hope for what it will be again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as one drop of oil exists, the joyous work continues.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken."-Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A new bird of prey - one that hunts sentience.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it." - Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn's creation is now his master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them." - Vy Covalt, Neurok agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fleeting shadows of his primitive self have all but vanished." - Jin Gitaxias, Core Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Accurate information is a precious commodity in times of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They can't even comprehend nature. How could they improve it?" - Venser

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no more time for secluded study. Answers are there only for those with the courage to take them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oculus is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In its gaze I saw no mercy, no recognition that I was worthy to exist." - Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexians are tenacious. That's not the same thing as clever." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Serum Raker is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The serum from the blinkmoths they gather greases the joints of witch engines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Metalcraft - As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mirror to draw its eye, a rod to rouse its rage, and a sword to break its bonds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work." - Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius." - Varil, Neurok partisan

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U},{T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Specimen 211 examination report. Observation: graft sublimation incomplete. Result: death. Prepare specimen 212."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Vivisection, sacrifice a creature. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexians research with the grace of surgeons and the finesse of butchers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection." - Geth, Lord of the Vault

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Caustic Hound is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player loses 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, the Mirrans aimed for its exposed gut. The survivors quickly learned to do otherwise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next step. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ours is a glorious transmission! Behold a future where all bow to the Father of Machines." - Isila, Priest of Sheoldred

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the dead are raw materials for the Phyrexian vision of perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The chest cavity is cleared of useless meat. I know just what to do with the space." - Gyed, Vault Priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from red and from white. Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in form of -1/-1 counters and to players in form of poison counters.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." -Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you get a poison counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of the oil and necrogen has produced many pleasant reactions." - Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature is put into a graveyard this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sadly, the extent of Gerkk's healing knowledge was "don't pick at it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A protective warren requires a good deal of prodding.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player. Metalcraft - If you control three or more artifacts, creatures that player controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirran creatures that could withstand the Phyrexian oil found an abundance of crunchy snacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A true warrior fights with whatever's handy." - Qerk of the Secret Warren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste. {1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its flight sets the sky itself on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Oxid Ridge attacks, creatures with power 1 or less can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They believe they're driving us back, but we're leading them to their doom." - Kethek, furnace stoker

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being surrounded by goblins is less objectionable when they're fighting for you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target artifact creature until end of turn. Untap that artifact. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All will be reforged in the fires of glory." - Urabrask the Hidden

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He didn't have a word for "home," but he knew it was something to be defended.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drive them back! Make their underworld into their grave!" - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red Sun's Zenith deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Shuffle Red Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature; or Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Spiraling Duelist has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never move the same way twice. Those rotters can't grasp chaos."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will reveal the futility of their heresy by showing them how fragile their relics are." - Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fangren fight without comfort of any kind. We can ask no less of ourselves." - Tilien, Sylvok partisan

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So, the survivors from Oxid Ridge are on the move. Let them come and witness predation in its purest form." - Glissa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Melira's Keepers can't have counters placed on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her warriors are the last defense against the coming storm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Metalcraft - That creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our land will not yield to Phyrexian corruption!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) If damage would be dealt to Phyrexian Hydra, prevent that damage. Put a -1/-1 counter on Phyrexian Hydra for each 1 damage prevented this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even a nuisance such as the pistus fly has a purpose in our new world." - Glissa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia's spiral of consumption grows even wider and darker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Phyrexian contagion corroded Karn's body, the praetors whispered psalms to corrupt his mind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vorinclex removed its teeth so it wouldn't waste time chewing before moving to the next kill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn is put into a graveyard, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fiercest hunters in the Tangle don't seek out the mantises. They are the mantises.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thrun, the Last Troll can't be countered. Thrun can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. {1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His crime was silence, and now he suffers it eternally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Domination by the strongest - that is all that matters in the Tangle now." - Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Viridian Emissary is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [-1]: Target artifact becomes a 5/5 artifact creature. [-4]: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is twice the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirran partisans created hundreds of patrol sentinels to divert Phyrexian assaults from the Tangle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, infect Blightsteel Colossus is indestructible. If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admire him. Few succeed in exhibiting style and humility at the same time." -Ezuri, renegade leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal." - Tae Aquil, Viridian weaponsmith

property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Core Prowler is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: "If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever." - Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, gets a poison counter, then puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mycosynth grew unfettered beneath the black lacuna, metastasizing into a matrix of noxious energy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such a creation serves no purpose other than exterminating every one of us." - Sadra Alic, Neurok strategist

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap... even the ground must join our cause." - Ezuri, renegade leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our glorious infection has taken hold." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of his or her library. Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, he or she may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anything that watches without sleep and fights without fear is a valuable ally against the Phyrexians." - Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a token that's a copy of that artifact onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faces of Geth's corpse-dredgers are disturbingly similar.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When Myr Sire is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield. {T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memnarch designed some myr to follow the levelers and reaffix lost parts. Mirran partisans put that instinct to good use.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."-Kessla, Sylvok shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our cause will ripen in the fertile flesh of the unworthy." - Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Basic senses like sight and taste are reserved for those in power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection." - Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip - Sacrifice an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains." - Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Razorfield Rhino gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Adapted to tread on razorgrass, the rhino proved adept at treading on Phyrexians as well."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Regenerate Rusted Slasher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a beautiful vision. Discarded debris is reborn as a singular entity." - Urabrask the Hidden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash You may cast artifact cards as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It evades Phyrexians by hiding in the spaces between seconds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shriekhorn enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Shriekhorn: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Partisan spies warned that no armor would protect the body from Phyrexian infection. Neurok strategists took that as a challenge.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Target creature can't block Spin Engine this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It will be battle-ready before our strike at Oxid Ridge, and it will guarantee our victory." - Ketuc of the Helm

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent. When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Flavor
property.value: "A true Phyrexian predator. It will never know death, just as nature intended." - Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and put five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Titan Forge. {T}. Remove three charge counters from Titan Forge: Put a 9/9 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Training Drone can't attack or block unless it's equipped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vulshok flail, Viridian shield, loxodon blade... Tazzir, bring the Moriok hook and assemble the rookies." - Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexians can't corrupt what they can't get close enough to touch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, that creature's controller gains control of Contested War Zone. {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
